title: Ignite Me
description: This is the 2nd book of the DEVIL KNIGHTS MC trilogy, and sequel to REBEL CHASERS   It might be time for Sydney and Shayla to move on.  Their time with Neil has been amazing and Sydney and Shayla are prepared to stick together by him no matter what. They know he wants a better, cleaner life and if giving up the party life is the cost, then so be it.   Every man has his breaking point.  Neil can't keep hiding his desire to walk away from the Devil Knights. The drug running is too much for him and Shayla and Sydney have given him hope for something different. His only worry is what Anton will do when he finds out.   It is dangerous to mix love and business.  Anton is not the kind of guy to take a hit to his business lightly. Letting Neil walk away is one thing, but losing his main money-makers is no laughing matter. Neil must do whatever he can to protect the two women or die trying.
author: Carmen Faye
